name: Leading Jewel Knight, Salome
effect:
[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:At the end of the battle this unit attacked, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose any number of cards with "Jewel Knight" in their card name from your hand, and call them to (RC) with units. productName: [VGE-D-VS03] V Special Series 03: V Clan Collection Vol.3

name: Silver Thorn Beast Tamer, Doriane
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):At the end of your turn, [COST][put all of your other rear-guards], and draw a card for every two cards put into your soul for this cost. If you put four or more cards, return a grade 3 card with "Silver Thorn" in its card name from your soul to your hand. If this unit is on (RC), retire this unit.
productName: [VGE-D-VS03] V Special Series 03: V Clan Collection Vol.3

name: Silver Thorn Handlegrip, Linnea
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When this unit attacks or boosts, [Soul-Charge 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
productName: [VGE-D-VS03] V Special Series 03: V Clan Collection Vol.3

name: Darkside Sword Master
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck)

name: Detonate Singer, Refiarade "Rock"
effect:
[AUTO](Hand):At the end of the battle your rear-guard attacked, if you have a vanguard with "Refiarade" in its card name and a [Rest] rear-guard, and all your circles with [Rest] rear-guards have force markers, [COST][Counter-Blast 2], ride this unit as [Stand], [Rest] all of your rear-guards, and move all your force markers to your (VC).
[AUTO](VC):At the end of your turn, remove all force markers from your (VC). You get an Imaginary Gift:Force for every two markers removed.
productName: [VGE-D-VS03] V Special Series 03: V Clan Collection Vol.3

name: Courteous Beauty, Seria
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC) or (RC), [COST][discard a card from your hand], look at three cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. This unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, it gets [Power] +10000 instead of +5000.
productName: [VGE-D-VS03] V Special Series 03: V Clan Collection Vol.3

name: Sparkling Soul, Nikita
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) or put on (GC), [COST][Soul-Blast 1 or more], and this unit gets [Power] +5000/[Shield] +5000 until end of turn for each [Soul-Blast 1] paid for this cost. If you [Soul-Blast 3] or more, draw a card.
productName: [VGE-D-VS03] V Special Series 03: V Clan Collection Vol.3

name: Cuddle Connect, Fanessa
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked or boosted, [COST][put a grade 3 or greater card from your drop on the bottom of your deck], put this unit into your soul, and draw a card.
productName: [VGE-D-VS03] V Special Series 03: V Clan Collection Vol.3

name: Mermaid Idol, Elly
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When this unit's attack or the attack this unit boosted hits a vanguard, search your deck for up to one "Mermaid Idol, Elly", reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. If you put a card into your hand, and this unit is on (RC), retire this unit.
[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (GC), [COST][put one "Mermaid Idol, Elly" from your drop on the bottom of your deck], and this unit gets [Shield] +10000 until end of that battle.
productName: [VGE-D-VS03] V Special Series 03: V Clan Collection Vol.3

name: Distinguished Wink, Radka
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When this unit's attack hits, draw a card.
[ACT](RC):[COST][Retire this unit], look at two cards from the top of your deck, put one card from among them into your hand, and discard a card from among them. This ability may only be used by a card with the same card name once a turn.

effect: [CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck)

name: Blue Storm Karma Dragon, Maelstrom "Яeverse"
effect:
[AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle that your rear-guard attacked, if that attack did not hit, [COST][lock one of your [Stand] rear-guards], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn. If you have a card with "Maelstrom" in its card name in your soul, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.
[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, if it is the fourth battle of that turn or more, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Critical] +1/drive +1 until end of turn. At the end of that battle, if that attack did not hit, for each of your locked cards, your opponent chooses a card from their hand or rear-guards, and puts it into their drop.
productName: [VGE-D-VS03] V Special Series 03: V Clan Collection Vol.3

name: Cobalt Wave Dragon
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When your rear-guard attacks, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

・25000 or more - This unit gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn.
・30000 or more - You may switch all of your rear-guards between the front and back rows.
・35000 or more - All of your front row rear-guards get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Demise Queen, Himiko "Яeverse"
effect:
[AUTO](Hand):At the end of your turn, if you have a vanguard with "Himiko" in its card name, and your trigger effects activated two times or more this turn, [COST][you have one or more rear-guards, and put all of your rear-guards into your soul], and ride this card as [Rest].

name: Dauntless Dominate Dragon "Яeverse"
effect:

Your opponent performs "Choose three of your rear-guards, and retire them. If you did not retire two or more units, choose a marker on your circle, and remove it" for each of those units retired.

name: Covert Demonic Dragon, Hyakki Vogue "Яeverse"
effect:

[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], search your deck for up to three cards with the same name as this unit, call them to (RC), and shuffle your deck. Then, choose the same number of your rear-guards as the number of units called, and lock them.
[AUTO](VC):When your locked card is unlocked during your end phase, [COST][put one of your rear-guards on the bottom of your deck], choose one of your rear-guards, and return it to your hand.
productName: [VGE-D-VS03] V Special Series 03: V Clan Collection Vol.3

name: Sealed Demon Dragon, Dungaree
effect:
[AUTO](VC):At the beginning of your battle phase, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, you may bind the top card of your deck.
[AUTO](VC/RC):When this unit attacks, put all of the cards in your bind zone into your drop. Perform all of the following according to the number of cards put. (This effect is mandatory)
・2 or less - This unit gets [Power] -10000/[Critical] -1/drive -2 until end of turn.
・4 or more ‐ Your opponent chooses a card from their hand, and binds it.
・5 or more ‐ Choose up to three cards from your drop, return them to your deck and shuffle it.
